text: Richland is an unincorporated community in Grainger County, in the U.S. state of Tennessee. ==History== A post office called Richland was in operation from 1877 until 1902. ==Notable person== Albert Miller Lea, a surveyor and engineer, was born in Richland. ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Grainger County, Tennessee Category:Unincorporated communities in Tennessee
title: Richland, Tennessee
